Title: Data I
Text: A standard pistol made of normal materials. Simple and easy to use.

Title: Data II
Text: Standard pistol used by Construct squads. Easy to maintain.

Title: Story
Text: A mass-produced standard weapon that you couldn't ask for more.\n—Weapon Designer Z

Title: Data I
Text: It does a good job overall, though nothing to really write home about.

Title: Data II
Text: A pistol from a previous era. Crude but hardy, it continues to see service.

Title: Story
Text: Its stylish pitch-black color and user-friendly design have greatly raised its popularity.

Title: Data I
Text: Equipped with a high-capacity magazine that can hold an exceptional number of rounds, it is a great choice for long-running battles.

Title: Data II
Text: Designed for stealth operation, it is capable of suppressing the sound of a muzzle blast.

Title: Story
Text: Only that dumb designer "I" would ever design such a complicated loading mechanism for a weapon. Why can't he put himself in the shoes of someone like me who reloads a lot?\n—Weapon Designer N

Title: Data I
Text: Modified from a general weapon, it is applied with the newest high-temperature coating, so that the user no longer needs to worry about the gun getting overheated. Its appearance alone shows the modifier's great expertise and attentiveness to detail.

Title: Data II
Text: A specialized firearm focusing on single-shot performance.

Title: Story
Text: To protect it from the damage caused by overheating in battles, Lee has carried out special adjustments and added his mark to it.

Title: Data I
Text: With a greatly upgraded aim assist, once an enemy is locked on, the bullet will definitely hit its mark as long as the trigger is pulled.

Title: Data II
Text: Equipped with a sophisticated nanocomputer, it possesses energy management and ballistic guidance capabilities.

Title: Story
Text: This is the best weapon for a terrible shooter like me—Wait, this line has to be deleted. I can't let "Z" and "I" know I'm a terrible shooter.\n—Weapon Designer N

Title: Data
Text: A large caliber handgun with a relatively long barrel. It can deal severe damage to enemies in close range. Someone favors its silver color and has added a line of small words to it as a reminder that evil shall be eliminated.

Title: Story
Text: Akdilek's craftsmanship... Niceeeee, I've got some new ideas.\n—Weapon Designer I

Title: Data I
Text: Forged with general high-speed steel. Its blade length is 1.0 m.

Title: Data II
Text: Standard knife issued to Constructs. Mass-produced and easy to use.

Title: Story
Text: A standard Katana for the Constructs who are skilled at Katana fighting.

Title: Data I
Text: Forged with general high-speed steel. Its blade length is 0.8 m and it is much harder to break than Standard Knife. The shorter length improves its portability as a self-defense weapon.

Title: Data II
Text: Knife typically carried for personal defense.

Title: Story
Text: A mass-produced self-defense weapon that you couldn't ask for more.\n—Weapon Designer Z

Title: Data I
Text: Forged with test-type high-speed steel. Its blade length is 0.9 m. A blade of good quality overall.

Title: Data II
Text: There is no inscription by the maker, but the blade itself is perfectly sharp and deadly.

Title: Story
Text: Just like its name—Unbranded Blade. There's nothing worth making it a brand.\n—Weapon Designer Z

Title: Data I
Text: Forged with superhard high-speed steel. Its blade length is 0.9 m. It is equipped with a small device that can be triggered to inflict lightning strikes.

Title: Data II
Text: A curious Katana based on a legendary blade in the old times.

Title: Story
Text: Why wouldn't you want to deal long-range damage with a melee weapon?\n—Weapon Designer Z

Title: Data I
Text: Forged with enhanced tungsten high-speed steel. Its blade length is 1.0 m. It is able to withstand scorching temperatures. Even the hottest substance on earth is nothing to it.

Title: Data II
Text: In addition to its super sharp blade, Lotus Berserker can even alter the Construct's attack patterns.

Title: Story
Text: My calculation says Lotus Berserker can withstand the temperature of lava. So out of my way! I'm gonna throw it into lava for SCIENCE!\n—Weapon Designer I

Title: Data I
Text: Forged with high-entropy alloy and a small amount of silver. Its blade length is 1.1 m. Compared with pure physical attacks, it is more suitable for inflicting elemental attacks. With high electrical conductivity, it can greatly improve the damage of lightning attacks.

Title: Data II
Text: Due to ■■■, its creator ■■■■ has now been ■■■■■.

Title: Story
Text: It is recorded that Inverse - Shadow was forged with the remaining materials of Inverse - Blood Crux, but even so, its power is still quite surprising. Inverse - Blood Crux's whereabouts remain unknown until today.

Title: Data I
Text: Its blade length is 1.1 m. It is equipped with a kinetic energy conversion device and an autonomic attack module. The conversion device can convert the kinetic energy from swinging the hilt into a laser. Pressing the button on the hilt can extend or draw back the laser blade, which has made it very easy to carry around.

Title: 情報2
Text: 武器としての評価は並だが、その凄艶な外見からコレクションとしての価値は高い。

Title: Story
Text: Using pure energy as a blade instead of making one out of physical substances has made Sirius a very important page in the history of weapons.\n—Weapon Designer Z

Title: Data
Text: Its blade length is 1.0 m. It was forcefully forged with multiple materials, but surprisingly, this has not weakened its hardness at all. For unknown reasons, the longer it is being wielded, the redder it becomes.

Title: Story
Text: A white-haired girl draws. In a flash, one became two—all cherry blossom petals in the air were already split. Satisfied, she sheathes.

Title: Data
Text: Forged with special multi-layer techniques, this extremely sophisticated weapon has a 0.9m blade length. Its color changes with temperature, and will display a light crimson wavy pattern under extreme circumstances.

Title: Story
Text: The wounds left by this blade never bleed, for blood has been frozen the moment when the wounds are cut. Its victim dies without even realizing they have been killed.

Title: Data I
Text: A generic wireless remote weapon.

Title: Data II
Text: Basic levitating attack devices. Easy for new Construct members to pick up.

Title: Story
Text: A standard Levi-Gun for the Constructs who are skilled at controlling it.

Title: Data I
Text: A semi-automatic levitating weapon controlled by the mind.

Title: Data II
Text: Levitating attack devices with partially autonomous AI, reducing the burden on the user.

Title: Story
Text: A mass-produced Levi-Gun that you couldn't ask for more.\n—Weapon Designer Z

Title: Data I
Text: It is said that this Levi-Gun was based on a certain carnivorous fish.

Title: Data II
Text: Equipped with a new mobility module, it is able to operate freely on the battlefield, delivering devastating firepower. Has been known to get out of control on rare occasions.

Title: Story
Text: I'm more curious about the fish it was made of than its performance.\n—Weapon Designer Z

Title: Data I
Text: Equipped with a test-type attitude control device, its stability has been brought up to a new level.

Title: Data II
Text: It is a fully independent, stand-alone weapon platform that is even capable of forming emotional attachment with the user over time.

Title: Story
Text: A test-type weapon for Type Zero. It has played its role in the research for enhancing the energy out.\n—Weapon Designer Z

Title: Data I
Text: Type Zero has a high level of stability with its newest attitude control device. To enhance its high-energy laser output, its barrel has been replaced by a slenderer one.

Title: Data II
Text: Its mobility is the price of stability enhancement, yet its power is of the highest level without a doubt.

Title: Story
Text: Only a few Levi-Guns have higher energy output than Type Zero. Achieving unmatched power is the reason why it was created.

Title: Data I
Text: Benediction is able to shoot high-energy electric arcs at the enemies. Its energy can be recharged via the solar ring collectors on both sides. Practically a bottomless battery as long as there is light.

Title: Data II
Text: Its attack accuracy is enhanced at a slight loss of power. A great weapon for one-against-many battles.

Title: Story
Text: The energy recharge had been a technological bottleneck for the Levi-Gun until the birth of Benediction. A short charging time is all it needs for long endurance.\n—Weapon Designer Z

Title: Data I
Text: With an electromagnetic restraint device, Dragon Wind will stay by the user's side. It absorbs the air with its filter absorber on the tail, compresses it inside the barrel, and finally, shoots it at the enemies.

Title: Data II
Text: Its performance is every bit worthy of the grandiose name.

Title: Story
Text: Adjustable output for the user... Clever. At minimum output, it basically functions as a fan. Is that the true reason why "I" made this weapon?\n—Weapon Designer N

Title: Data I
Text: A general bow provided in the archery ranges.

Title: Data II
Text: Composite bow for practice, designed to be handled by beginners.

Title: Story
Text: A mass-produced practice bow that you couldn't ask for more.\n—Weapon Designer Z

Title: Data I
Text: With a pulley added to it, the user can pull the bowstring effortlessly.

Title: Data II
Text: Pulley-assisted composite bow, with firepower comparable to firearms.

Title: Story
Text: Pulley Bow is easy to use and carry around.\n—Weapon Designer Z

Title: Data I
Text: With a 36" axle-to-axle length, Falcon E-3320 is easy to carry and has a good level of accuracy. A 7.6" brace height makes it not difficult to use. A good weapon for the beginner.

Title: Data II
Text: After the first batch was launched, its production was halted due to ■■■.

Title: Story
Text: The newest composite bow produced by Falcon Industries. It is a fairly good weapon, but its value as a collection is much higher.\n—Weapon Designer Z

Title: Data I
Text: With a 39"" axle-to-axle length, Ramiel boasts high stability as well as accuracy. The special reagent equipped on its bow limb enables the arrow to corrode its target's armor for further damage.

Title: Data II
Text: Named after the fallen angel, it ensures a kill regardless of the environment.

Title: Story
Text: Ramiel is the perfect bow in blitzes or long-running operations. That dumbo "I" keeps adding weird stuff to his weapon designs as usual.\n—Weapon Designer Z

Title: Data
Text: In order to enhance Tonitrus' electrical conductivity, some special materials have been added to it during the production. Coupled with its resistance to electricity and high temperature, it can adapt to nearly all harsh environments on earth.

Title: Story
Text: Comes out good as new even if you chuck it inside a thunderstorm. (Tested) Bianca can be rest assured that her weapon will never break down again.\n—Weapon Designer I

Title: Data
Text: The cutting-edge design used in this longbow enables its string to withstand high-intensity, repeated pulling. During rapid firing, one can even hear faint echoes of the stars in the phantom of its bowstring. Those who struggle from suffering and injustice often call out for hope and justice. If Utopia truly exists, Astraea will be its answer to them.

Title: Story
Text: This weapon does belong to Babylonia, but the model seems somewhat familiar... Well, it's probably a resonance. A good weapon will always be aesthetically pleasing no matter when or where it is used, or who is using it. I believe that's what she had in mind when she gave it to you. —Weapon Designer E

Title: Data I
Text: A common chainsaw used in the heavy industry.

Title: Data II
Text: A common tool that can also be used as a weapon.

Title: Story
Text: A mass-produced chainsaw that you couldn't ask for more.\n—Weapon Designer Z

Title: Data I
Text: Designed for outdoor operations. While in use, it will let out a lot of heat and noises.

Title: Data II
Text: A massive chainsaw that runs on gasoline. Takes a lot time to rev it up.

Title: Story
Text: Why couldn't "I" make this thing quieter?.I can't always be the one to pick up the slack, right?\n—Weapon Designer N

Title: Data I
Text: A wind-powered chainsaw that ensures security and mobility when being wielded.

Title: Data II
Text: The first generation of chainsaws developed specifically as a weapon. Named after the sparks it created during testing.

Title: Story
Text: It cuts its target in a matter of seconds, just like what its name indicates.\n—Weapon Designer Z

Title: Data I
Text: A chainsaw forcefully combined with different kinds of industrial parts. When it is activated, it will let out loud roars like the legendary monster Chimera.

Title: Data II
Text: A chainsaw with a slightly bizarre appearance, though it does not affect its performance.

Title: Story
Text: The one who created this chainsaw is either a genius or a lunatic.\n Weapon Designer Z

Title: Data
Text: A hydraulic chainsaw with accelerating chains. Its special reagents will increase the saw blade's temperature to diminish the target's fire resistance.

Title: Story
Text: Ohohohoho, spin fast like the wind, little one! Now, let's spice it up some MORE with FIRE and EXPLOSIONS!\n—The GREAT Na☆na☆mi Sama!

Title: Data I
Text: An ordinary greatsword with an ordinary name.

Title: Data II
Text: Common greatsword for Construct use. Heavy and unwieldy.

Title: Story
Text: A mass-produced greatsword that you couldn't ask for more.\n—Weapon Designer Z

Title: Data I
Text: A quality greatsword that can deal heavy damage to an enemy.

Title: Data II
Text: Greatsword with long reach and strong defensive capability.

Title: Story
Text: This greatsword is designed for riot suppression. Its blade is not sharp. A weapon that has a quite long history.\n—Weapon Designer Z

Title: Data I
Text: Equipped with a mini shooter, it can unleash a wave of energy produced when being swung.

Title: Data II
Text: It is able to fire shockwaves when its internal energy tank is filled.

Title: Story
Text: This is made for the Constructs with bottomless stamina. Z's Kuji no Sada must have cribbed my design idea!\n—Weapon Designer N

Title: Data
Text: A greatsword that resembles a Christmas tree. The Star of Bethlehem is stuck tightly on the tip, so tight that not even a fierce swing can shake it off. The blade is not sharp, but its bulk makes it a deadly weapon.

Title: Story
Text: A festive weapon for festive events. I should have added a music player to it.\n—Weapon Designer I

Title: Data I
Text: A greatsword that can take on the most zealous enemies by virtue of its firmness, length, and girth. Equipped with an impact-absorption device, it can even convert explosive impact into its own energy.

Title: Data II
Text: Originally given a different name, it was renamed by Kamui after he took a liking to it.

Title: Story
Text: Behold blessed perfection. The only issue is that it is perhaps too big to be called a sword. Big Kamui is not something most Constructs can handle.\n—Weapon Designer Z

Title: Data I
Text: It is infused with radioactive elements that will inflict penetrating damage on the enemies and corrode the wielder at the same time. Therefore, only Constructs with corresponding resistance are recommended to use this greatsword.

Title: Data II
Text: It is modified from the weapon of a corrupted Construct.

Title: Story
Text: I heard that this lad in Strike Hawk has pretty good radioresistance. Haha, let's get this guy to use my baby.\nWeapon Designer I

Title: Data I
Text: Low-cost and simple. It is a practical bazooka for a one-man army.

Title: Data II
Text: Bazooka for Construct use. Can be used as a blunt weapon when out of ammo.

Title: Story
Text: A mass-produced bazooka that you couldn't ask for more.\n—Weapon Designer Z

Title: Data I
Text: It has a higher level of accuracy and its projectiles can deal greater damage.

Title: Data II
Text: The barrel will rotate when firing a projectile.

Title: Story
Text: Enhanced bazooka with a comprehensive boost in performance.\n——Weapon Designer Z

Title: Data I
Text: With a higher energy output level, it boasts a faster rate of fire and greater power.

Title: Data II
Text: Prototype cannon equipped with an internal reactor. Be careful of overheating.

Title: Story
Text: It fires projectiles like a volcanic eruption. Coupled with its high portability, the price-performance ratio is unrivaled.\n—Weapon Designer Z

Title: Data
Text: Its design is inspired by firecrackers. The firecrackers on the tail can be loaded into the barrel as a projectile. It has a several second downtime after every shot.

Title: Story
Text: It is not merely a toy for celebration. Based on my calculation, it can destroy the CIC's holographic screen with only one shot.\n—Weapon Designer I

Title: Data I
Text: Berserk Fusion uses shaped charges that can penetrate the enemy's armor with ease. The regulator on the tail can alter the shell's detonation initiation to achieve the most effective damage against the enemy. Some mechanical parts that should not appear on a bazooka have been forcefully installed in it—in an apologetically restrained manner.

Title: Data II
Text: Though restrained, the inane amount of extra modules still makes this weapon scream death.

Title: Story
Text: This method of weapon modding feels familiar...\n—Weapon Designer Z

Title: Data I
Text: With high thrusting power, exhaust velocity, and thrust-to-weight ratio, it can produce thermal energy that can toast even the toughest of the Corrupted.

Title: Data II
Text: It can fire flames like a dragon's breath at its maximum output level.

Title: Story
Text: It has sacrificed its effective range for the unsurpassed power. In no way am I going to stand before it.\n—Weapon Designer N

Title: Data I
Text: A common dagger that has nothing to write home about.

Title: Data II
Text: Simple and easy to use.

Title: Story
Text: A mass-produced dagger that you couldn't ask for more.\n—Weapon Designer Z

Title: Data I
Text: An extremely sharp dagger that can cut through nearly all substances in this world.

Title: Data II
Text: The special layer of coating makes this weapon non-reflective.

Title: Story
Text: Since it does not reflect light, it is an ideal weapon for an assassin.\n—Weapon Designer Z

Title: Data I
Text: Even though it is forged with a special ore, its blade is still as sharp as a razor.

Title: Data II
Text: It might not excel in size, but its penetrative power should never be underestimated.

Title: Story
Text: Stone Heart rivals a metal dagger in all fronts. Basically no drawbacks, except the bit about it requiring special maintenance.\n—Weapon Designer Z

Title: Data
Text: A dagger made for the Lantern Festival. The words carved on its blade are to bless its wielder.

Title: Story
Text: A highly collectible weapon created to commemorate the "Lantern Festival" in the old times.\n—Weapon Designer Z

Title: Data I
Text: Soul Ripper has a unique blood groove that enables it to inflict effective and continuous damage on the enemies. The fuller below the hilt can divert the liquid away, so that the hilt will not be contaminated.

Title: Data II
Text: Dagger equipped with ion vibrators, causing severe damage to the area around the wound. Requires great skill to use effectively.

Title: Story
Text: Those who have been cut by Soul Ripper will have their blood drained rapidly as if their souls were ripped out... A weird record by "I", again.\n—Weapon Designer N

Title: Data
Text: By pressing the button on its hilt, the blade will vibrate at an extremely high frequency to increase its cutting sharpness. It contains traces of radioactive elements that can deal severe penetrating damage to the enemy's mechanical parts.

Title: Story
Text: High-frequency vibrating blade, a kinetically optimized curve for the deepest cut... All craftconstructship is of the highest quality.\n—Weapon Designer Z

Title: Data I
Text: A common scythe that has functional sharpness.

Title: Data II
Text: A standard scythe used by different squads. Simple and easy to use.

Title: Story
Text: A mass-produced scythe that you couldn't ask for more.\n—Weapon Designer Z

Title: Data
Text: A standard scythe implemented with a hilt and foldable features for ease of transport.

Title: Story
Text: The long attack range allows the wielder to defeat multiple enemies at once.\n—Weapon Designer Z

Title: Data
Text: Even though the coating on its blade has slightly faded because of its long history, it is still sharp enough to be a deadly weapon on the battlefields.

Title: Story
Text: Durability is its biggest advantage.\n—Weapon Designer Z

Title: Data
Text: When its blade cuts through a Corrupted, it will leave a thick layer of corrosive substance to corrode its armor rapidly. Once the substance penetrates the frame, it might even cause a temporary short circuit.

Title: Story
Text: A weapon designed by Ayla herself. You can already feel how much it hurts just by the design sketch alone.\n—Weapon Designer N

Title: Data
Text: St. Elmo is made of a highly conductive alloy. Its foldable design makes it very easy to carry around. Whenever it is swung, the blade leaves a flash of blue lightning. Electricity flows through the blade.

Title: Story
Text: It can unleash a great amount of electricity without producing any heat. St. Elmo's Fire, good name, ain't it?\n—Weapon Designer I

Title: Data
Text: Galatea is created based on a brand new concept in answer to the dissatisfaction with the existing weapons. It's a perfect vessel that reflects the creator's spirit and holds everything inside. It conveys the creator's feelings and composes an epilogue for the enemy.

Title: Story
Text: Its perfection is a silent mockery after going beyond the creator, but Haicma, who achieved this, is imitating the concept of 'love.' Boring. —Magician

Title: Data
Text: A greatsword that is worn from countless battles. The wielder has wrapped it with bandages as perfunctory fortification.

Title: Story
Text: Still usable even though it's already worn and torn like that. Should we give credit to its materials or its wielder? —Weapon Designer Z

Title: Data
Text: A tough sword with a dull edge, made so that the wielder can brutally crush the enemies. Nonetheless, it requires advanced swordsmanship to use.

Title: Story
Text: This greatsword is awesome, but "I", can you explain to me why'd you put the blood groove there? Does it really work?! —Weapon Designer N

Title: Data
Text: The mechanism installed on its hilt has dramatically boosted its cutting capability, and its edge produces searing heat to melt all kinds of machines. In the event of a long solo operation, the wielder can pull the lever to initiate its automatic maintenance to clean and maintain the blade.

Title: Story
Text: Now, it should have all the features it needs. Hope this greatsword can help bring our comrades back from dead zones. —Weapon Designer N

Title: Data
Text: Its blade length is 0.9 m. The blade can expand and split into two to inflict double the pain. Stabbing an enemy with it does not deal significant damage, but extracting the blade will make a river of vital fluids, causing long-lasting, unbearable pain.

Title: Story
Text: Miss Vera... I... I'll do what you so... I'll mod it the way you want. So please sheathe that katana... —Weapon Designer N

Title: Data
Text: The first ever mass-produced Rail Spear for military use. It is equipped with a powerful blast cannon and also has outstanding performance in melee range.

Title: Story
Text: They told me cost mattered a lot, and I finally understood it a long time after taking over that military weapon project... — Weapon Designer Z

Title: Data
Text: A special Rail Spear designed specifically for Task Force Constructs. The warhead of its cannon has a built-in shock field that breaks armor apart from inside.

Title: Story
Text: I'll be honest. We only received the all-clear for the shock module's safety test when this thing was already delivered in batches. — Weapon Designer Z

Title: Data
Text: The core of this Rail Spear is a high-energy component that is still in the experimental phase. The engineers must have given it the divine spear's name for a reason.

Title: Story
Text: Remember that deadly thing brought by the Science Council? Yep, I had it installed on this prototype. I mean, why not? — Weapon Designer N

Title: Data
Text: These standard gauntlets have been optimized for their melee user's body features. A boost mode is activated for increased striking force once they come into contact with the target physically.

Title: Story
Text: Regarding the irreversible damage in joints and frame caused by the power boost device... What? Asimov cut four times with a file, then it was fixed?! —Weapon Designer L

Title: Data
Text: Equipped with power components that should never be installed on gauntlets, these bold, reckless yet incredibly powerful weapons have a total of 663 pages of manuals and safety alerts.

Title: Story
Text: I said these things were still in the test stage! You can borrow them, but we won't take responsibility if anything happens! —Weapon Designer H

Title: Data
Text: The technical data of this set of gauntlets was lost. It could only be manufactured from standard blueprints and protocols with millimeter-and-nanosecond-level accuracy. Of course, their power made it all worth it.

Title: Story
Text: Press the button three times, turn the bolt clockwise twenty-six and a half circles, chant the chief engineer's name three times, then inject the lubricating oil... How the heck did that even work?! —Weapon Designer Y

Title: Data
Text: The blade of this quaint and well-crafted spear sends a chill up people's spines, keeping them away even when it is only placed on a rack.

Title: Story
Text: The experience we learned from manufacturing this model can be used as reference when developing long weapons in future... Wait, what? Why did they terminate the subsequent development? —Weapon Designer H

Title: Data
Text: Forged from gilded steel, this blade will eliminate all the hesitation. Only when there is no more conflict shall it meet its sheath.

Title: Story
Text: We are the Association of Art, why did you ask us to manufacture a weapon? ...Look at this beautiful piece of art! Please, allow me to give it a try! —Ayla

Title: Data
Text: This blade is infused with the power to create realms. Its inky shaft does not tolerate any discord. Whoever gets to wield this weapon must rule the world.

Title: Story
Text: No, we never had the capability to 'craft' this weapon. All we did was to 'restore' it to the form it was supposed to be. —Allen

Title: Data
Text: The outdated and rudimentary structure makes Genesis look fragile and weak, but it can still play a role in term of amplification on bioic animals after countless years.

Title: Story
Text: I didn't expect to see the amplifier of that era. Its designer Karash was a sensational genius, but such a genius didn't participate in Arcadia action. It's really sad.—Z, a weapon designer

Title: Data
Text: It's the modified version of the first generation amplifier "Genesis", with a reinforced structure and improved energy transmission circuit, resulting in a significant increase in its output.

Title: Story
Text: Stability and practicality are its labels, and the dazzling energy burst like prominence is its characteristic.

Title: Data
Text: When the amplifier Ozma is used to amplify bionic animals, sufficient computing support must be provided, otherwise it will be hard to perform its real effectiveness , even be involved by its computing consumption, resulting in limited performance of the bionic animal. The amplification covers various aspects of the bionic animal, even the resistance or application of the bionic animal to punishing. Double-edged sword is the best word to describe it.

Title: Story
Text: Powerful, mysterious yet forbidden wisdom is contained in Ozma, which always shows that this is an existence that humans should not easily touch.

Title: Data
Text: A pair of white blades kept by samurai of the East.

Title: Story
Text: How long can I continue to believe in a world laden with deceit and folly? How long, I wonder?

Title: Data
Text: A pair of white blades kept by samurai of the East.

Title: Story
Text: How long can I lie to myself as I despair at the dark future of this world? How long, I wonder?

Title: Data
Text: The latest YoRHa model.

Title: Story I
Text: Hi guys! It's me, 42S—your favorite YoRHa Squadron idol from North 12C Defense HQ. I'm here with the latest hot scoops from the front line, so let's get out there and do our best, all right? Goooo team!

Title: Story II
Text: Hey ho, battlefield buddies! I'm not gonna lie here—the current war situation isn't looking too optimistic, but we're expecting reinforcements from our orbiting satellite bases any moment, so don't give up yet! Glory to mankind!

Title: Data
Text: The latest YoRHa model.

Title: Story I
Text: Mayday! Mayday! This is Publicity Agent 42S from North 12C Defense HQ! Is anyone listening?! Our facility has been completely surrounded by machines! I don't know how much longer we can ho—

Title: Story II
Text: [NO BROADCAST FROM THIS CHANNEL]

Title: Data
Text: A black blade used by warriors of the East.

Title: Story I
Text: Once, long ago, there was a group of seven boys who were born in the same village. Though they were not brothers by blood, they treated each other as family.

Title: Story II
Text: One cold night, a fortune-teller appeared and warned of a traitor among them. The boys laughed it off and went about their business, but the next morning, one of them lay dead.

Title: Data
Text: A black blade used by warriors of the East.

Title: Story I
Text: With each passing night, another boy died. The survivors grew more and more suspicious of each other, each harboring terrible doubts about what happened to their brothers.

Title: Story II
Text: On the morning of the seventh day, a single survivor stood tall. Cleaning the blood from his hands, he chuckled to himself. "Better go find the traitor!"

Title: Data
Text: Purchased under the terms outlined in Babylonia military weapon contract SMS-FY-AF-0223. Cosmos Industries products can always be trusted.

Title: Story
Text: This gun set is manufactured under the supervision of Babylonia Parliament, the Science Council, and Cosmos Industries, strictly following the requirements set out under the standard Construct weapon procurement contract SMS-FY-AF-0223.\nOut of 76 qualifying submissions, the proposal with the lowest overall cost has been chosen for mass production.\nCosmos Industries products can always be trusted.

Title: Data
Text: A mysterious experimental anti-material gun set. Its barrel was forged from special alloys to accommodate unique armor-piercing bullets.

Title: Story
Text: Thermal energy, shockwave, or any other high-tech gadgets...\nThe nature of weapon is gradually forgotten when soldiers start to rely on fancy technologies.\nIn comparison, this weapon is a combination of simple mechanism with state-of-the-art manufacturing, ensuring its user never experiences misfire or in-bore detonation.

Title: Data
Text: On one side of the barrel is the feather-light special flechette-shaped rounds. On the other side is an inevitable ending for their target.

Title: Story
Text: Wind, humidity, falling trajectory, the Coriolis force...\nAll those factors may become obstacles for the execution of judgement.\nBut the Scale doesn't care, neither does its user.

Title: Data
Text: I mark the beginning of everything. All notes and chants come after.

Title: Story
Text:
Poems, stories, melodies, legends...
They all need a beginning.
Shh, can you hear her blade cutting through the air?
Here it starts.

Title: Data
Text: The shining steel blade drives the tightened string. Elegant, lightweight, yet unstoppable.

Title: Story
Text: Weapon Designer D: How do you want me to do this?\nAyla: Um... Listen to this music while you work, maybe?\nWeapon Designer D: Oh, okay.

Title: Data
Text: Soft, rhythmic, but carries a great weight of meaning. It is the wind in the forest, the fluttering of wings, and the happiness of victory.

Title: Story
Text:
The master of forest walks out of the serene valley.
She summons singing cuckoos and plays her enchanted strings.
What story lies in that song of yours?
And who are you awaiting?

Title: Data
Text: A kind of weapon batch produced in accordance with Kara Type I Gunblade, which finds a delicate balance between power and cost.

Title: Story
Text: Romance! Yes, that's romance! Loading a gun onto a blade, making it a weapon suitable for a variety of medium to close combat sounds romantic!—Weapon designer I

Title: Data
Text: The Gunblade, a weapon left over from the Operation Acadia, has the craftsmanship that has long been lost. And now, Babylonia can only carry out simple maintenance to keep it running normally. Kara Type I Gunblade has more excellent research value than application, and provides an excellent data templet for developing other subsequent gunblades in Babylonia.

Title: Story
Text: How exactly did Kalash convert the muzzle jet kinetic energy into the energy to drive the gunblade? If his research data hadn't been lost during the Great Evacuation, we wouldn't have been so slow in developing the gunblade.—Weapon Designer Z

Title: Data
Text: Not all constructs can withstand the chill it constantly emits, and the fit between the gun and the blade reaches a wonderous peak through cold tempering. The energy released from the muzzle is transformed and utilized in the turbine to the extreme, driving the blade to emit a strong resonance.

Title: Story
Text: When people reopened the door of the long-fallen weapons lab at the top of Kawakarpo, what they saw was the Gunblade lying among mechanoid wreckages, reflecting a dim blue light. Even after the corruption of long years and cold temperatures, it still worked like it had never been covered with dust. It was retrieved and brought back onto the battlefield by humans.

Title: Data
Text: It is the first generation of Co-Bots researched and manufactured by Kurono Laboratory in the early days. This refined prototype is based the Medic Bot's design. It retains the function of balancing the user's M.I.N.D. to a certain extent, and maximizes its combat power, making it an indispensable prototype for the improvement of the future Co-Bots.

Title: Story
Text: Incredible! The Medic Bot has become an extension of herself. I've never seen such a fragile yet powerful Construct... If removing it poses too great of a risk... then let's modify it into a weapon. What a wonderful idea!

Title: Data
Text: It's a Co-Bot developed by Asimov using data templates acquired from numerous experiments. Based on the first generation of bots, Animus is able to not only balance the M.I.N.D., but also share it with its users. Whether it is a Co-Bot with multiple battle modes or a high-performance laser beam to supplement to combat power, both can become a natural extension of its user through Animus' special external link. Such intuitive design... it seems like the most beautiful and ingenious weapon.

Title: Story
Text: Cool boy, doubled than any other weapon in the Lab!——Weapon Designer L

Title: Data
Text: It's a Co-Bot with unprecedented computing power and independent tactical analysis. "He" is equipped with the most advanced external link technology, allowing "him" to link to a Construct's M.I.N.D. Only when "he" is used by No. 21, can "his" true potential be unleashed. Like a bullet pierces the enemy's throat on the battlefield, this Co-Bot has the explosive power of a beast trained for the Colosseum. When you see "him" on the battlefield, you wonder if you are looking at a soul born to fight.

Title: Story
Text:
Hey, you're here. How is your experience on that externally-linked Co-Bot 2.0?
"Snore."
"Just send the data report to my terminal."
"Snore."
"...Sorry?"
"...His designation is 'Snore'."
No. 21 repeats somberly. The researchers of the Science Research Department One cannot help but rename the cutting-edge weapon.
"Snore, what a cute name! It suits you!"
"L-Leonie, why would you pinch the cheek of a Cerberus..."
"What? Is something wrong? She's a lamb."
"Yeah, but she's looking at you like she wants to kill you."
"That's just you misunderstanding the girl. Now, I have to go, for—I want Snore to be able to stay with you sooner."

Title: Data
Text: One of the prototype weapons developed by the Science Council. The reason they decided to design a weapon as garish as a banner spear is not clear. On second thought, this might be why the banner spear has not been mass produced.

Title: Story
Text: Is this your plan of improvement for the spear weapon? "You were the one who said it needs to be more noticeable!" "I meant we should make its power level more noticeable!" —Conversation between weapon designers

Title: Data
Text: A modified banner spear with a golden-tailed flag to indicate its superiority to the prototype. Weapon designers have paid extra attention to the design of the flag to make sure it stands out among the other banner spear prototypes.

Title: Story
Text: My secret to creating above-average products? First of all, its performance cannot be worse than its competitors. Second, its presentation needs to stand out from the rest. Take this one as an example... as long as its performance stays the same, we can play around with the design of the flag... What? The "Phoenix" has beaten my proposal? —Weapon Designer Y

Title: Data
Text: This banner spear has seen multiple trials and battlefields, but its shape-memory alloy and self-healing structure has kept it pristine and unspoiled as if it is newly forged. The way it stands unwavering has reminded others of a certain legendary, undying Construct. Or perhaps the shape-memory alloy and self-healing structure are just a white lie? Maybe staff members of the Science Council have kept sneaking into the maintenance room every day to replace it with a new one.

Title: Story
Text: The self-healing ability of this spear is so good it's unbelievable. I still can't understand that guy's aesthetics, but this thing performs exceptionally. I'm glad that I've shut that guy up permanently... With this, I'll be able to become a Weapon Department—no, a Science Council superstar! ...Huh? Who's knocking at this hour?

Title: Data
Text: A weapon used by some pioneers in the past during the expansion. It has a simple structure yet multiple functions, but the chain isn't easy to master.

Title: Story
Text: It brings hope for some, but despair for the others.

Title: Data
Text: Nobody knows whether this weapon would spit out deadly bullets or mocking flowers, or the red glow on its blade is a warning or a reminder. This oddly shaped weapon is as mysterious as its user, making it impossible for others to interpret their real intention.

Title: Story
Text: Colorful confetti scatter in the air under the arc, and the red stage is covered in flowers.\nA man stands in the center of spotlight and takes a bow toward the empty audience.\nHe closes the curtain with his "rose."

Title: Data
Text: Durendal was long lost in the history of the Golden Age. Rumor has it that its blade can pierce through everything, and its crosshair will reveal all hidden foes. The immortal Durendal will fight along its user until their last breath, dedicating absolute loyalty to the person that it protects.

Title: Story
Text: You had a brilliant story. Many people had great expectations of you. Yet, you ended up like this. Well, what's done is done. Let's walk together in the shadow from now on.

Title: Data
Text: The spinning wheel of light has significantly enhanced the damage-dealing efficiency of the weapon. The design is thus widely used by other scepters later.

Title: Story
Text: I can watch it spinning all day.

Title: Data
Text: The plug-in component keeps revolving around the center, with light as bright as that of the polar star radiating through the gaps.

Title: Story
Text: First I wondered what kind of like could penetrate the heavy smoke on the battlefield and shine above my head. And then I realized that was not light from a star. That was the light of a lone hero wielding the scepter.

Title: Data
Text: A scepter with a simple coloring scheme and structure, yet an extraordinary amount of energy. There are few records on the scepter, but any description would be redundant. You will understand this the moment you see it.

Title: Story
Text: The sacred flame surrounded by Hestia's white wings leads the travelers in the dark and witnesses the indomitable courage of the explorers. It spreads the hymns of heroes among the city-states and undying light across the vast land.

Title: Data
Text: I'm the base of rhythms in music. Everything's change is by your ears.

Title: Story
Text: The beauty of music is in change, and the base is the rule of change. She hides the sound of the sword in the flute music and brings you the singing of the wind.

Title: Data
Text: The black flute looks deep and composed, concealing all the innocence in her heart. Now her charms are all overthrown, she wields the sword to stay committed to her last duty.

Title: Story
Text: The sound of waves echoes everywhere, making people sad. To repel the loneliness and the darkness, she plays solo on the scorched earth. In the faint melody of the flute, there seem to be chirpings of Naples.

Title: Data
Text: A snow-white flute with golden sparkles resembling the light of the sun rising at the end of winter and symbolizing the return of spring.

Title: Story
Text: Even though they say that she is a demon and surround her with hostility, she still calmly takes the champion's sword and thrust it through her chest. In the daylight, she is finally reborn. Having escaped the fate of early death, she is looking forward to the next reunion with you.

Title: Data
Text: A product of the latest technology. It has excellent performance but weighs way heavier than a standard weapon.

Title: Story
Text: Who ordered the weapon? It weighs more than twice as heavy as a standard one! "It's Pulao." "Oh, I see. Then never mind." — A conversation between Fuxi Crew members

Title: Data
Text: A weapon with an unconventional straight blade design. In order to increase its overall stability, the designer has added extra metal rivets to the blade.

Title: Story
Text: Will this slow down the weapon when we spin it? "Then just use more strength." — A conversation between Fuxi Crew members

Title: Data
Text: A weapon designed by a dancer. Maybe that's why it looks like a prop for performance.

Title: Story
Text: May you be safe and sound in this everchanging world. — Hanying

Title: Data
Text: A mass-produced saw component made with standard alloy. Cheap, big, and economical.

Title: Story
Text: The delivery is fast, but it looks like something is missing. Let's see if we can add something cooler later.—Nanami's Journal

Title: Data
Text: The modified chain component has an upward-pointing blade top and enhanced sawblade, making the saw even thicker. The personalized coating has been improved at the user's urging, as "making it cool" is the ultimate goal.

Title: Story
Text: Uncle designer finally agreed to make Nanami's number bigger. Why is it so hard to change the color of the chain blade? Why the color red? Just travel around in the universe and you'll see how beautiful the color is.—Nanami's Journal

Title: Data
Text: The latest mega saw plan designed by Nanami. It features a complex joint structure and a conspicuous coating. Powered by the Energy Core's sudden increase of temperature, the sawblade will reach its max explosive power.

Title: Story
Text: The ultimate evolution of the weapon is done! Only this form matches Power and—Nanami's intelligence!—Nanami's Journal

Title: Data
Text: A strange weapon modified from engineering equipment primarily used to explore new methods in weapon development. Long-ranged firepower has been added to make up for its lack of power at close range.

Title: Story
Text: Just use this to smash a Corrupted right on the head! "It says it's okay." Researchers in a weapons R&D laboratory are arguing about leaving what they want to say as its conception.

Title: Data
Text: By integrating the data collected from its prototype and the feedback from the prototype's wielder, it has eventually become an even more powerful weapon than its original model. The grip, power, trajectory, and a hundred other improvements have all been made, resulting in a weapon capable of shattering any doubts and despair.

Title: Story
Text: After the weapon's design was verified for its viability and tactical significance, the sound of a heavy object clanging could be heard more and more frequently from inside the weapon research laboratory.

Title: Data
Text: The creation of Illuminare is a game changer in Babylonia's weapon development history: its performance-centered exterior is revolutionary, it is committed to maximizing destructive power, and even its wielder, Karenina stormed into the Weapons Design Bureau pressing for the removal of safety limiters. There is no doubt that its final result will be exactly what Karenina said, "This is gonna send all the enemies out of this galaxy!"

Title: Story
Text: There is a theory that the universe was born from an "explosion" with massive energy. When Illuminare reaches its maximum power output, flashes of light can be seen from its clashes in a dimmed environment. These are not usual sparks as speculated at first. Out of everyone's expectation, the researchers detected a slight amount of particles that only existed in the early universe when the flashes occurred. Perhaps this weapon really has the power to create a new world and future for its wielder.

Title: Data
Text: The weapon given to the adventurer before they set off usually carries the hope of the entire village. Don't you think this is a perfect name? You'll feel full of courage just at the thought of fighting for the village.

Title: Story
Text: A weapon "he" created based on Noan's Rev Blade blueprint with random materials at hand. Only the offhand weapon remains unchanged.

Title: Data
Text: Babylonia has improved the performance issues of the old blueprint and remade the Rev Blade with strong materials. "Progressive Knife" is a name Noan came up with himself. It seems he got the inspiration from a manga he read. "Great name. Promise me don't name any weapon next time." —Weapon Designer H

Title: Story
Text: When the weapon design department received this Rev Blade blueprint, they were surprised to find that it is a plan obsoleted by Babylonia ten years ago. It was sent to Earth along with other old weapons and plans a long time ago and should have been used by humans on the ground for self-defense.

Title: Data
Text: A Rev Blade made with the improved blueprint by Babylonia's weapon design department. It uses upgraded materials and perfectly matches the off-hand old sword. However, it is restricted by the old design after the overall improvement of performance and requires regular maintenance. What Noan does is hit it several times.

Title: Story
Text: Having been told to give a meaningful name to the weapon, Noan intended to name the weapon "Chione" for the cold winter is not over yet when the weapon is wielded. But the Gray Raven Commandant suggested Noan name it Prometheus, because "It will bring the fire and courage able to melt the snowfield and welcome liberty, just like it is described in Shelley's poem."

Title: Data
Text: An extensible sword that makes its owner able to fight flexibly. Its low-key gray color might not stand out, but the energy hidden in it is astonishing.

Title: Story
Text: A pitch black sword... I know there's a black sword well known for pairing with a white sword. How about we name this sword after it? Its name is Elu*******. says a designer of Kurono, who happens to also be a Golden-Age anime freak.

Title: Data
Text: The sword's blade and body have been converted to match the latest specialized frame with its coating changed to a more transparent black color. The world will be launched into an eternal polar night when the power in the sword is released through its blade.

Title: Story
Text: The polar night is not just about the darkness but also the silence, the stars, and the bright aurora.

Title: Data
Text: One of Kurono Tech's best products. A perfect combination of elegance and wildness. When the executor wields the sword as if she is making a prayer, it looks like the multi-faced goddess of the crossroads in the myth has descended to bring victory to her allies and the end to her enemies.

Title: Story
Text: Hecate is known as the goddess of witches and witchcraft, but she also guides people. She'd be sure to fulfill the wishes of those who offer their prayers.

Title: Data
Text: A sword doesn't have a heart. It only needs to be wielded by its wielder... Is it not?

Title: Story
Text: Automatic control mechanisms are not needed. It'll be drawn out only when I allow it to.—Vanessa said so to the weapon designer.

Title: Data
Text: A composite weapon with a transformation blade. Created by adopting the newest molecular dynamics technology, its silver blade has a much more lethal curvature and emits a faint blue glow.

Title: Story
Text: As if a meteor tears open the night sky, its blade is so sharp that it can cut through anything in its attack range. In fact, its sharpness is dangerous enough to even damage its wielder, but its wielder and her mistress seem unconcerned about it.

Title: Data
Text: A new-generation special-grade weapon created by Babylonia. While its weight has been further reduced, the argon gas vacuum condensation technology has brought the durability and sharpness of its blade to a level that ordinary metals are impossible to achieve. Repeated hammering and heating also cause its blade to emit a dark blue glow. When wielded, its wielder seems to be controlled by invisible strings to deliver silent death.

Title: Story
Text: Over the boundary between dawn and dusk, time and again, the girl awakes from cycles of memories, fearlessly wielding her sharp blades to destroy the rusty cogs in the clock. Even though her resistance goes unknown, with the hands on the clock moving silently, the girl's voice has already reached the one bonded to her.

Title: Data
Text: This prototype of Composite Armaments can satisfy the user's needs in close, medium and long range firepower based on the battle situation. The materials used in the relatively more fragile transforming mechanism have all been electro-magnetic processed to ensure a reliable and smooth transition between different forms.

Title: Story
Text: Stop complaining about the unit cost. I tried 26 firmware materials, 18 coating materials and 43 prototypes... All of which are just part of the sunk cost and not even included on that list. —Weapon Designer Z

Title: Data
Text: This set of Composite Armaments has been specially approved by Babylonia's Military Weapon Development Center to use an experimental δ-ray core as its energy supply. This is the first time a δ-ray of this scale is deployed on a weapon, so its user must have the ability to master the pace between the δ core's energy output and instant cooldown.

Title: Story
Text: You are absolutely right that this weapon carries a risk that cannot be neglected... But that δ core is as small as a pea! Can you imagine how romantic it is to carve a core to this size? It's like putting a nanoscale black hole inside a marble! —Weapon Designer N

Title: Data
Text: Mankind needs a hope that can confront this dark era. Cosmos Industries, Weapon Development Center and the user Lee himself have discussed many times to calibrate his specialized frame and its exclusive equipment. After installing an additional tactical AI, this weapon has been pushed to its limit in all aspects. "There's no need to compromise to the environment; I won't allow any mistake to happen."

Title: Story
Text: The focus now is no longer whether we can embrace the envisioned future or not. Even if mankind has taken a wrong path, someone needs to break through the confinement of dimensions to reverse the course. This key is a desperate effort. Regardless of the outcome, it must be able to help him cross that door.

Title: Data
Text: It was originally designed to be a multipurpose painting tool, but after a range of features were added for convenience's sake, it achieved an unexpectedly high score in the Science Council's weapon testing session.

Title: Story
Text: Instant freeze, laser cut... with a mini thruster at its tail. Wouldn't it be cool if its paint sprayer could ionize pigments to shoot out a particle beam? Wait... what was I going to make at first?—Leonie

Title: Data
Text: To accommodate the WGAA's newest frame's specifications, this Beam Gunlance has been modified for the finest adjustments on each parameter. As strongly required by Ayla, it also retains a painting function, which makes it one of Ayla's favorite paintbrushes.

Title: Story
Text: With this special module added, the light blade will create a rainbow-colored trail when wielded... What's the point of it? For looking even more gorgeous!—Ayla

Title: Data
Text: A Beam Gunlance made exclusively for Ayla after undergoing a meticulous final adjustment. It is, in fact, her dream weapon as it absorbs different suggestions and inspirations from many Constructs, which means it is a work involving all her friends.

Title: Story
Text: One day, she is going to cross the sea of clouds and wander on the river of stars with her yet-to-fulfill wish.

Title: Data
Text: A custom weapon made of an odachi and a kodachi. It merges a nimble style with beast-like sharpness.

Title: Story
Text: A weapon is but a tool to project power, and power... is just an extension of one's will.— Alpha.

Title: Data
Text: Infused with the power of Ascension-Network, this legendary blade has the power to cleave through thunder. It strikes like red lightning, obliterating all enemies in its path.

Title: Story
Text: Taste the dragon god's... —The weapon designer, upon obtaining this precious replica, was on the verge of spouting this catchphrase, but his peers quickly silenced him.

Title: Data
Text: Forged from an unknown material, this daisho is meant for sole wielders. When drawn, the stored energy gets unleashed, piercing the darkness like the first light of dawn.

Title: Story
Text: Winter approaches with the moon riding high. The sword slices through the swirling night wind, illuminating a scarlet trail in the profound darkness. Catching a glimpse of the first light signaling night's end, the girl changes her course, dashing toward the dawn she has chosen.

Title: Data
Text: Modified with the technologies of Church of Machina, this fan still possesses the essence of Kowloong with golden threads and santalwood bones.

Title: Story
Text: The original design comes from a fan used by Hanying during her dances. Zavier reinforced it with new materials and came up with this weapon.

Title: Data
Text: Special decorations were added to this fan according to the user's needs, making it look more like a dance prop than a weapon. The fan gives a radiant brilliance when waved, but its power should never be underestimated on the battlefield.

Title: Story
Text: What exactly do you want? Aesthetic, functional as a weapon, and can be used in dance? Why don't you ask me to paint it in colorful black...? Hold on, I think I have an idea... —Weapon designer

Title: Data
Text: The special metal used to forge its blades allows it to not only inflict cuts that are deadlier than originally expected on its enemies but also to radiate dazzling light when wielded. After the design draft was completed, Pulao secretly added a flower to the fan's main rib.

Title: Story
Text: When rains and winds have stopped, only a solitary lamp shines under the full moon. The girl gazes toward the lights of the bustling city under the mountain as she folds her fan away and sits back. Despite the passage of time, the moon is always there, shining upon the days of the past and people of the present.

Title: Data
Text: The design of these edged weapons is based on the claws of predatory animals. Very few Constructs can adapt to using them in battle as they significantly deviate from the typical human battle mindset.

Title: Story
Text: If we are to completely mimic the moves of a beast, should we also add two legs— "No. We don't have the budget." —A conversation between Kurono project manager and developer

Title: Data
Text: These blades are designed exclusively for No. 21's wild, untamed combat style. The three reinforced energy claws can easily tear through any obstacles.

Title: Story
Text: It sounds like trio music when it tears the enemies apart! —Kurono Weapon Designer

Title: Data
Text: When swung, these Claw Blades would make a sharp, piercing howl as if there is a ferocious beast inside. The blades reflect a chilling light, resembling a lone wolf sharpening its claws in the shattered moonlight.

Title: Story
Text: It says it's hungry. —After hearing the slight humming of the energy claws, No. 21 turns around and asks Noctis for food.

Title: Data
Text: Forged from a special alloy, this robotic arm's supersolid layer assembly allows it to withstand high temperatures and pressures. It is a perfect answer to those who question the performance of Construct weapons.

Title: Story
Text: The purpose of a weapon is to extract possibilities from the impossible... What? You want it to be silver? Nah, someone already picked that color. —Weapon Designer Q

Title: Data
Text: This robotic arm has adopted a red and black color scheme with a streamlined frame. As requested by its user, additional vents and rectifier have been added to maximize its performance.

Title: Story
Text: Give it a pair of wings, it'll become a fighter jet. Put four wheels on it, you'll have a super car. —Weapon Designer D

Title: Data
Text: As the ultimate fusion of engineering and violence, this weapon is Noctis' favorite. The fermions that flow inside the arm are creating non-stop annihilation on a micro level. Even when it is stationary, the roaring noise deep inside the crimson core still longs for explosion and destruction. Noctis himself does not care about any of those features—he is happy as long as the weapon is powerful enough.

Title: Story
Text: Imagine pushing all thermodynamic theories to the extreme, when your power system is bursting with degenerate matter, and positrons are wildly ramming the vacuum pumps. Only the laws of the universe will be your limit... "Plain language please." "Use with caution. It is capable of triggering an annihilation explosion with a yield equal to 20 quantum missiles." "Really? That's so cool!" —A dialogue between Noctis and Weapon Designer Q

Title: Data
Text: Inspired by coastal reefs, this weapon's irregular blade makes its attacks unpredictable. Very few can handle this weapon well.

Title: Story
Text: Her world used to be very small, consisting of only foam and plastic airbags surrounded by cardboards.

Title: Data
Text: Amidst dark clouds and storm, the weapon cuts through the rain to reveal its true look. The silver-coated blade may appear to be slim, but no one would doubt its elegance and lethality.

Title: Story
Text: The daughter of the sea gazes into the distance, where land, sand, and soil would be. There will be grass growing after a rain, and wind passing through the valley. "It must be different from the sea breeze," she thinks.

Title: Data
Text: Back in Atlantis, Lamia read some books that mentioned the weapon used by the God of the Seas—a trident. Those who possess this trident will have the power to rule the sea, and can even bring the dead in the sea back to life. But legends are just legends after all; Lamia only picked up a broken weapon from the sea and modified it into the current form with the power of Punishing.

Title: Story
Text: The days of the past feel like a dream. She cherishes those dreams, and they stay with her.

Title: Data
Text: A mysterious weapon used by BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER.

Title: Story
Text: Capable of firing 20 rocks per second, it can also transform into a giant blade.

Title: Data
Text: BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER's weapon. Capable of firing 20 rocks per second.

Title: Story
Text: With a rock-like appearance and structure, its origins are just as mysterious as its owner.

Title: Data
Text: The new military composite metal has proved it once again that with the enough toughness and strength, it is okay to reduce the weight of a weapon to the minimum.

Title: Story
Text: Weapons have to be portable. Mixing up different types of iron blindly for better performance is not a wise choice. Too much weight will make a weapon a burden. Balance is especially important for beginners.

Title: Data
Text: The new unimolecule vibrating blade has greatly enhanced the weapon's combat efficiency but reduced some of its stability. In other words, the wielder needs to have a tighter grip. As one of the design highlights, the ergonomic redesign of the handle offsets the defect by reducing the unwanted vibrations when the weapon is wielded to the minimum.

Title: Story
Text: The design I'm talking about is not limited to something functional, which is of course important, but without proper esthetics, even expensive weapons would be same as the stones used by monkeys. You know? Use white! White!

Title: Data
Text: What is the best way to get the max killing power while staying suitable for all kinds of battle environments? Having the user carry four or five different weapons? Of course no. You just have to make them into one. This is the unprecedented multifunctional polymorphic design that comes with an expensive price and a complex use logic. No way to be mass-produced. Only designed for the strong.

Title: Story
Text: The researcher's esthetics are suffocating. Even if the weapon itself has an excellent performance, its appearance is simply soulless. After a few rounds of discussions, we decided to combine the black paint and the green paint with the jagged edges that I feel greatly proud of. The weapon is like a dark falcon that gives the enemy an oppressive feeling when taken out. Very reliable.

Title: Data
Text: Forged from a new type of alloy, this mass-produced longsword is based on a blueprint and features a sharp blade and a slender body. Its color scheme mainly consists of black and dark green.

Title: Story
Text: The blueprint of this sword was taken from the archives. When I first saw it, I knew the designer was talented as they adopted a rather experimental concept—pity it wasn't implemented. I was quite interested in the crafting of longswords. After several attempts, I finally got a mass-produced version that was close to the design concept. It was totally unexpected.

Title: Data
Text: This weapon is designed specifically for a monarch, featuring an exquisitely luxurious appearance with intricate patterns carved into the blade, and a deliberately crafted structure that perfectly balances flexibility and cutting power.

Title: Story
Text: The files related to this weapon are marked as top secret, and are said to be provided by a mysterious third party. Our researcher put in a lot of effort to crack the forging technique of this sword. Whoever designed it must be a master. In addition, its elegant appearance also left us a deep impression. The swan-like grace and awe-inspiring power of this longsword will forever be remembered on the battlefield.

Title: Data
Text: With a golden blade and a jade structure, this sword was crafted and perfected by three masters and has incorporated all the essence of their craftsmanship. Its advanced mechanism allows it to switch between different forms, making it swift, powerful, and lethal. Not only it is a weapon fit for a sovereign, but it also serves as the key to Tabula Akasha.

Title: Story
Text: This weapon was forged with classical techniques and cutting-edge mechanical concepts. When it was passed to me, it had already been fine-tuned by many master artisans, resulting in a longsword of top-tier functionality and appearance. Even if not used as a weapon, it could be considered a piece of art. Whoever holds this stunning sword must possess extraordinary courage and confidence. In addition, it is also the key to Tabula Akasha and is impossible to replicate.

Title: Data
Text: A military headphones prototype installed with the Second-Generation Communication Protocol Framework, it excels at high-speed computing and cyberspace conflicts. With its dependable battery life, it can adapt to different battlefields.

Title: Story
Text: Its dark gray outer shell keeps it hidden during combat, which kind of abides by the main principle of versatility. Its ergonomic wearable design is also commendable.

Title: Data
Text: A portable computer installed with the Third-Generation Communication Protocol Framework, it performs as a tactical terminal during cyberspace conflicts while possessing a high-grade firewall. On top of that, it is also a working headphone as it appears to be. With military-grade modules, it is capable of audio analysis and monitoring environmental information in real time. It may be small, but it is mighty.

Title: Story
Text: The two art directors had a disagreement on the color palette of this weapon. Designer A wanted to use the pale gray color of the polar day sky as the main color, while Designer B preferred a glacier-like clearness. As the two argued, the mysterious buyer who ordered the weapon offered a third idea—the color of polar bears. This finally settled their debate.

Title: Data
Text: With an amplifier disruptor and a miniature active radar, this weapon can detect and track nearby targets while recording suspicious signals. High-speed channels and mimic firewalls grant this weapon high offensive and defensive power, ensuring the efficiency of cyberspace battles while reducing the inaccuracy of close-range information. However one puts it, this weapon is a far cry from its intention and its adorable appearance.

Title: Story
Text: The mysterious buyer who ordered this weapon provided its blueprint. The designers took two weeks to study how it was meant to be assembled and several months to acquire the necessary components, finally delivering the weapon right before the deadline. The difficulty of the design surprised the designers, and the amount of engineering work was unexpected. They were certain that the customer was a weapon expert as well.

Title: Data
Text: Condensed from the Red Tide, this weapon embodies a new power that has transcended countless hardships. Though its form is still somewhat naive, it already radiates a brilliance sharp enough to shake the world.

Title: Story
Text: Whether it is the Red Tide or the Punishing Virus, they are no more than stepping stones in humanity's pursuit of evolution. The choice of tools is not going to impact mankind's progress and determination.

Title: Data
Text: Withered plants must be burned down before new trees can grow. Only absolute destruction can lay the path to true rebirth. No one can halt the incoming revolution—she never fears the cost of change.

Title: Story
Text: Will this power mark the beginning of annihilation or become the key to a new word? The future of the world lies in the hands of the user of this Chakram.

Title: Data
Text: No law or theory can bind this weapon, for it has the power to reshape all the principles that the world runs on. It tears apart everything it sees, reconstructs them, and crushes them again like a child whimsically playing with building blocks.

Title: Story
Text: This weapon's design follows only one principle: to abide by no existing principles.

Title: Data
Text: Developed specifically for the Support Force, this mass-produced weapon features superb stability, a simple and intuitive design, and a user-friendly structure, making it suitable for most rescue missions.

Title: Story
Text: We don't need to load this weapon with so many energy-draining features! We want something that can be efficiently and reliably mass-produced, so get rid of that electromagnetic bomb from the blueprint! —Bridget's instruction to the weapon designer.

Title: Data
Text: This specialized weapon is a second iteration developed from the successful Standard Tactical Tonfas. The built-in Energy Shield has undergone thousands of stress tests to ensure it can save the user's life in any extreme environment.

Title: Story
Text: This is definitely the most powerful weapon we can develop within our current budget! I can safely stand under its shield when someone's throwing bricks at me from the ship's bridge! —Weapon Designer N

Title: Data
Text: After receiving ample funding, Babylonia's weapon research department has developed this masterpiece with confidence. Crafted with an arsenal of cutting-edge technologies, this weapon is engineered to withstand immense pressure under any circumstance while delivering brutal, destructive power capable of pulverizing any enemy bold enough to stand in its way.

Title: Story
Text: This weapon is inspired by the combat techniques of ancient Roman gladiators, which require fighters to maintain balance amidst fierce fighting and strike back at the perfect opportunity. Only those who have honed their bodies through countless battles can master this ultimate vessel of destruction.

Title: Data
Text: As the famous Kowloong lyric poem Song of Concubine Ming goes, 'She travels thousands of miles on horseback with her pipa, the spring back in the palace now feels like a whole different world to her.' After the strings are broken and buried in sand, summer arrives, but there would be no one to appreciate the beautiful scenery.

Title: Story
Text: No need of fancy design? Just keep it simple? Well... I guess you're thinking of the yellow sand in frontier areas during ancient times.

Title: Data
Text: Arriving like spring, a bird that lands on a branch, she plucks the strings in the moonlight under the begonias and performs the song of Fairy Garment. The melody flies up and reaches the heavens in the tranquil night.

Title: Story
Text: She fears the dim moonlight, the scentless begonias, and her pipa to be out of tune, so no one would appreciate her music.

Title: Data
Text: Is it real or is it all but a dream? When the music starts, the butterfly dances, and a dream will be created. Leave the question aside until the song is finished.

Title: Story
Text: Dream or not, the melody is real, the freedom is real, and my heart is real as well.

Title: Data
Text: It was specifically stated that it should not have an overly complicated design because it would be hard to carry around. Most importantly, that will affect Wanshi's ability to sleep on the spot when he wants to.

Title: Story
Text: Don't you think the coolest bit of a battle is when you load the gun and put it down?

Title: Data
Text: Upholding the rule of "a clear view is essential to a clean hit", it has precision on par with a sniper rifle. The user had other expectations for it, hoping that it could be like a certain mythical item from the legends, to not only protect the living, but to also escort the souls of the deceased on the path to eternal life.

Title: Story
Text: Bullseyes, one-hit knockouts, the principles of sniping can be applied to all weapons. —Wanshi

Title: Data
Text: After numerous tests to guarantee projectile speed and enhance the support function of the drone as per Wanshi's suggestion, it can now perform rapid shooting without losing firepower or precision. When asked for the reason for these modifications, he replied that he did not want to be in a situation where he lost either speed or power again and leave more regrets.

Title: Story
Text: If I had to describe the expectation I have for my ideal weapon as a flower, what kind would I pick? "Hm... Do you know the flower language for hollies? It blooms in all four seasons, never wilting." "I hope when a gun is fired, it doesn't bring war, but the continuation of life." "Just like a sun that never sets, never engulfed by the night."

Title: Data
Text: A prototype weapon made according to the latest military directives. It features a blade stem embedded with a pyro core and an exterior forged from high-entropy alloy, capable of slicing through steel like butter. Originally designed to test the limits of the pyro technology, its remarkable performance has led to its formal induction into active duty.

Title: Story
Text: This weapon's changed the rules of close-quarters combat. When you see the luminescent restraint release, get the hell out of there, friend or foe!—the designer who got a piece of test material embedded in the Star of Life.

Title: Data
Text: Through endless struggles of life and death, the girl etched every skill learned in battle in her heart. With every strike of her blade, the echoes of the past reminded her: her fight was far from over, for those still fighting, and for those who could fight no more.

Title: Story
Text: ...Also, I would like the colors to better represent the spirit of the Gray Ravens —Lucia

Title: Data
Text: Ashes rise in gray flames, the golden rays dispel the gloom. No matter how dark the abyss, the fire of the red lotus will bloom with the brilliance of dawn. No matter the obstacles ahead, the girl will soar on wings of hope, victorious as promised.

Title: Story
Text: A Pyro Katana specially crafted based on Lucia's combat records. It is a weapon with the perfect balance of weight and blade strength, a weapon born to eradicate The Punishing. "I wish to grow stronger. Grant me the strength to unleash my full potential and fight alongside the Commandant."

Title: Data
Text: This new weapon, forged from military-grade prosthetics using a revolutionary super-solid layering process, excels in diverse combat scenarios and significantly boosts individual combat effectiveness. Its potential is immense, whether deployed on the battlefield or adapted for civilian use.

Title: Story
Text: Four arms is the limit! You want to add two more? Out of the question!—Weapon designer Q

Title: Data
Text: Legend speaks of a night in antiquity, wind howling, clouds obscuring the moon, and demons prowling. Suddenly, a thunderous roar shattered the gloom. A deity, cloaked and staff in hand, descended upon a bolt of lightning. In a blinding flash, the demons scattered like chaff before a storm. This was the Thunderous Exorcism, a tale whispered through the ages. —From the "Strange Stories from Misono"

Title: Story
Text: We've incorporated cultural elements into the coating based on user preference, enhanced its structural integrity, and increased the backpack's power capacity, enabling it to operate in more demanding environments.\n"Yeah, it's a famous story back home. Perfect for the theme." —Yata

Title: Data
Text: A lone traveler, burdened by the weight of time, trudges along a frozen path, adrift like a single leaf on a vast ocean, finally reaching the end of the labyrinth. A thousand years have passed, yet the air still hums with the scent of flowers. The world shimmers with illusions, a kaleidoscope of reality and fantasy. This time, she seizes the fleeting moment, unleashing a torrent of thunder, shattering the illusions.

Title: Story
Text: Critical joints are forged from high-entropy alloy, capable of snapping iron with a single exertion of force. The backpack is equipped with experimental coils, providing the construct with a more stable magnetic field, enhancing its control over electric currents.\n"The Enlightened King, three-faced and six-armed, eyes blazing, wields chains of lightning, eradicating ignorance and guiding all beings to ultimate nirvana."

Title: Data
Text: Crafted from standard alloy, this Shield Axe is both offensive and defensive, capable of multiple form transformations. But due to its weight, mass production was not approved.

Title: Story
Text: This is the finished product based on that rough sketch. It's a shame we couldn't use the best materials. It could've been so much more powerful.—Weapon designer N

Title: Data
Text: Its platinum color and the radiance it emits during battle are reminiscent of the glorious colors in Golden Age mecha anime. Take up "Sparkle" on the battlefield and blaze a new trail that still shines bright.

Title: Story
Text: This time, I've used an ultra-light metal, so even an 80-year-old grandma or a 3-year-old kid could easily wield it... What? You won't approve mass production unless I lower the material costs? No! This doesn't make sense—Weapon designer N

Title: Data
Text: Perfectly recreating the legendary divine weapon from the girl's wild imagination, every part can be extended into a dazzling combo. Its goal is to cut through all boring things, like loneliness and sadness. Even "unchangeable" fate will be shattered by it.

Title: Story
Text: And adding a few more stars... Alright! The ultimate, invincible, super powerful Shield Axe is complete! Want to try Nanami's ultimate move? It's an all-out swing, tossing all techniques aside! Hah! Hah! Hah!—A battle-charged Na☆na☆mi
